de.propra2.ausleiherino24.web

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.propra2.ausleiherino24.web.MainController

  • @Controller
public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    MainController manages all actions that are available to every visitor of the platform. This includes basic browsing, and sign-up/login.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainController(UserService userService, ArticleService articleService)

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        @GetMapping(value={"/","/index"})
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getIndex(java.security.Principal principal)
        Displays the main page. Here you can see all articles offered by users.
        Parameters:
        principal - Current user.
        Returns:
        Main page / "index.html".

      • getLogin

        @GetMapping(value="/login")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getLogin()
        Returns:
        Spring Security login form.

      • getRegistration

        @GetMapping(value="/signup")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getRegistration()
        Displays user registration form. Creates new User and Person objects, that will be filled with required information about the user.

      • registerNewUser

        @PostMapping(value="/registerNewUser")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView registerNewUser(@ModelAttribute @Valid
                                                                                                           @Valid User user,
                                                                                                           @ModelAttribute @Valid
                                                                                                           @Valid Person person)
        Saves new User and Person object in database after user has completed the registration process. They will then be redirected to the login page.
        Parameters:
        user - User object with attributes parsed from HTML form.
        person - Person object with attributes parsed fro HTML form.
        Returns:
        Spring security login form. TODO: Automate login after registration.

      • getIndexBySearchString

        @GetMapping(value="/search")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getIndexBySearchString(@RequestParam
                                                                                                        java.lang.String searchString,
                                                                                                        java.security.Principal principal)
        Visitors can browse all articles in database by a simple search query.
        Parameters:
        searchString - Article name, that the current visitor is looking for.
        principal - Current user.
        Returns:
        View of all query-related articles.

      • getIndexByCategory

        @GetMapping(value="/categories")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getIndexByCategory(@RequestParam
                                                                                                        java.lang.String category,
                                                                                                        java.security.Principal principal)
        Visitors can browse all articles by category.
        Parameters:
        category - Category selected by the user.
        principal - Current user.
        Returns:
        View of all category-related articles.
